name: Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's Murders in the Rue Morgue
name_original: Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's Murders in the Rue Morgue
description:
Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's Murders in the Rue Morgue is a game developed by ERS G-Studio. It came out on 17-12-2009. Big Fish Games published the game.
You can play Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's Murders in the Rue Morgue on PC.
